page.title: 02HOUSING ON HEDWORTH ESTATE
page.content: Most of the houses on{Hedworth {Estate}are owned by{South Tyneside {Council.}There two or three bedroomed semi-detached houses for rent. Rent for a typical three bedroomed house is Â£25.54 per week. There are bungalows for old persons and two storey flats for single people or small families. Shops with two storey flats above are the tallest buildings on the estate. Houses have front open-plan gardens to the roads sited on the development. Brick, tile and timber panels are the main building materials. Heating is by gas or electricity or coal. The estate was built on farmland between 1950 and 1982. There are some private houses. They range in price from Â£25,000 to Â£35,000. Most were built about 1966.
